Stiker Bisa Memberi Keamanan Bagi Kendaraan, Ini Penjelasannya
07 Nov 2019, 01:23 by Antara, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Stiker ternyata bisa memberikan keselamatan bagi kendaraan angkutan bermuatan besar pada malam hari. Misalnya stiker 3M Diamond Grade Conspicuity yang telah menyesuaikan dengan peraturan Direktur Jenderal Perhubungan Darat Kementerian Perhubungan.
"Kami senantiasa mendukung kebijakan pemerintah Indonesia untuk memastikan pada pengguna jalan aman saat berkendara. 3M Diamond Grade Conspicuity memenuhi Peraturan Dirjen Perhubungan Darat no. KP.3996/AJ/DRJD/2019," kata Business Director Infrastructure, Construction, Energy and Goverment Market 3M Indonesia Audist Subetki di Jakarta, Rabu 6 November 2019.
Audist mengklaim produk stiker terbaru itu sudah sesuai dengan standard di sekitar 55 negara dunia tentang standard UNECE-R 104. Standard itu mengenai keselamatan kendaraan angkutan barang seperti kereta gandeng (trailer) dengan adanya logo E-mark pada stiker.
"Karena banyak produk palsu yang tidak standard. Standardnya, itu ada simbol ICE. Kalau di kementerian, bilangnya APC (alat pemantul cahaya). Di 3M, logo itu ada di dalam, jadi tidak bisa dihapus. Kalau produk yang palsu, logo itu di luar dan mudah dihapus. Nilai reflektif-nya juga jelas jauh produk kami," katanya.
Audist mengatakan stiker pemantul cahaya 3M itu memiliki garansi pemakaian hingga lima hingga tujuh tahun dengan daya tahan produk mencapai belasan tahun.
"Daya rekat lima hingga tujuh tahun itu minimal. Reflektif-nya kami menjamin garansi sampai tujuh dan ada juga lima tahun tergantung jenisnya. Tapi, kami jamin dari garansi itu habis, produk kami masih dapat bertahan. Bahkan, stiker itu bisa bertahan hingga 10-12 tahun," ujarnya.
Produk stiker 3M itu memiliki koefisien minimum retro-reflektif sesuai dengan nilai koefisien dalam UNECE-R104 yaitu nilai koefisien minimum retro reflektif kuning 300, putih 450, dan merah 120. Nilai itu sudah dua kali lipat dari nilai standar yang diberlakukan sehingga stiker memiliki daya tahan baik.
Produk yang dibanderol seharga Rp1,1 juta itu tersedia per gulungan 2 inci x 50 meter dan dalam varian warna putih, kuning, merah dengan edge-seal yang memiliki ketahanan hingga lima tahun

Stickers Can Give Security To Vehicles, Here's The Explanation
Nov 7 2019, 01:23 by Antara, Eko Ari Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Stickers turn out to provide safety for large transport vehicles at night. For example the 3M Diamond Grade Conspicuity sticker that has adjusted to the regulations of the Director General of Land Transportation of the Ministry of Transportation.
"We always support the Indonesian government's policy to ensure that road users are safe when driving. 3M Diamond Grade Conspicuity complies with Regulation of the Director General of Land Transportation no. KP.3996 / AJ / DRJD / 2019," said 3M's Infrastructure, Construction, Energy and Government Market Regulation Director. Indonesia Audist Subetki in Jakarta, Wednesday 6 November 2019.
Audists claim that the latest sticker products are in accordance with standards in around 55 countries of the world regarding the UNECE-R 104 standard. The standard is about the safety of goods transport vehicles such as trailers with a E-mark logo on the sticker.
"Because there are many counterfeit products that are not standardized. The standard is ICE symbol. In the ministry, it says APC (light reflecting device). At 3M, the logo is inside, so it cannot be removed. If the product is fake, the logo is on outside and easily removed. The reflective value is also clearly far away from our product, "he said.
Audist said the 3M reflective sticker has a guaranteed usage of up to five to seven years with product durability reaching dozens of years.
"The adhesion of five to seven years is minimal. Reflective we guarantee a guarantee of up to seven and there are also five years depending on the type. But, we guarantee that the warranty runs out, our products can still survive. In fact, the sticker can last up to 10- 12 years, "he said.
The 3M sticker product has a minimum retro-reflective coefficient in accordance with the coefficient value in UNECE-R104, which is a minimum yellow reflective value of 300, white 450, and red 120. That value is twice the standard value applied so the sticker has durability well.
The product, priced at Rp1.1 million, is available per roll 2 inches x 50 meters and in white, yellow, red variants with edge-seal that has a durability of up to five years
